        "From _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 12 2022: (Start)",
        "a(n) = Sum_{j=0..7} (-1)^j*binomial(4*n+1, j)*binomial(11-j, 4)^n.",
        "G.f., e.g.f., and recurrence are in the file \"Generating functions and recurrence\". (End)"
